name: Consensus
description:
When deciding on a game to make for The 2019 Game Maker's Toolkit Jam, we had so many Good Ideas™ that we couldn't possibly pick only one!

So now that's you're job! You have 24 hours to go through our notes and prototypes and decide which game we should create! Use the Mouse and Keyboard to examine and interact with each game and click the X and ✓ to cross out or decide on a game! 

Made by Silver Lewis, JohnLee Cooper, and Special Guest Simon Berest!

With sound and art stolen from all across the internet!
